languages.text: Лекс-дознаватели испытали код самыми суровыми и хитроумными канонами, но криптографическое откровение не было даровано им.

traits.locale_text: Под толщей скалистой породы авгуры обнаружили множество небольших полостей, засыпанных снегом, льдом и обрушившимися скалами. Будь то естественные образования, норы неизвестных ксеноформ или нечто иное — определить истинную природу находки не удалось.

languages.text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
languages.original_text: Лекс-дознаватели испытали код самыми суровыми и хитроумными канонами, но криптографическое откровение не было даровано им.

traits.locale_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

languages.text: 思律审讯者试图用以最严密、巧妙的方法来破解加密信息，但密码的复杂程度超出了他们的能力。
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

traits.locale_text: 思律审讯者试图用以最严密、巧妙的方法来破解加密信息，但密码的复杂程度超出了他们的能力。

languages.text: レックスインテロゲイターは、最も骨の折れる精巧な規準でコードを試したが、暗号解読は彼らの手には負えなかった。
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

traits.locale_text: レックスインテロゲイターは、最も骨の折れる精巧な規準でコードを試したが、暗号解読は彼らの手には負えなかった。

languages.text: Los lexinterrogadores probaron el código con sus cánones más duros e ingeniosos, pero una revelación criptográfica estaba más allá de sus posibilidades.
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

traits.locale_text: Los lexinterrogadores probaron el código con sus cánones más duros e ingeniosos, pero una revelación criptográfica estaba más allá de sus posibilidades.{g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g}

languages.text: Lex-Interrogatoren bearbeiten den Code mit ihren strengsten und einfallsreichsten Methoden, doch eine kryptografische Offenbarung bleibt ihnen verwehrt.
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

traits.locale_text: Lex-Interrogatoren bearbeiten den Code mit ihren strengsten und einfallsreichsten Methoden, doch eine kryptografische Offenbarung bleibt ihnen verwehrt.

languages.text: Les interrogateurs de la Lex Imperialis soumettent le code à l'épreuve de leurs protocoles les plus rigoureux, sans pour autant parvenir à le déchiffrer.
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.

traits.locale_text: Les interrogateurs de la Lex Imperialis soumettent le code à l'épreuve de leurs protocoles les plus rigoureux, sans pour autant parvenir à le déchiffrer.

languages.text: Lexsorgucular, kodu en güçlü ve usta edevatlarıyla sınasa da kriptografik bir çözümleme gerçekleştirmeyi başaramıyor.
languages.original_text: Lex-interrogators tested the code with their most severe and ingenious canons, but a cryptographic revelation was beyond them.
